moves.1. e4: I haven't played for a long time. Usually i would play kings Gambit or some sort of sacrifice but i've forgotten them. Time to test my rusty skills.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 d6: Hmmm... I thought he'd go Nb8-c6. The Phillidor Defense he has chosen to play. F7 wpuld be the weak square.
moves.4. Bb5: I don't know why i did this move. I believe c4 was better.
moves.4... Bd7 5. d3 a6 6. Bxc6: No choice. That knight now or never.
moves.6... Bxc6 7. Bd2 Qf6 8. h3: Again a Pointless move. He wasn't even trying to pin my knight.
moves.8... h6 9. Qe2 O-O-O 10. Be3: preparing for an attack on A7
moves.11. Nd2: Just thought It would come in handy.
moves.15. Qxf6 Nxf6 16. Nxe4 Bb4+: The exchange ends with me leading by a pawn.
moves.17. Nc3 Bxc3+ 18. bxc3 Re8 19. O-O: Althought it may be Pointless to Castle in the middle game I just needed to develop my Rook.
moves.20. c4 Rf5 21. Bd4: I attempt to Counter Attack him.
moves.21... Nh7 22. Rab1: Jsut applying pressure to the pawn.
moves.22... Rf4 23. Be3 Rf5 24. Bd2 h5: This was when i was going to get smashed.
moves.25. Rbe1 Rxe1: Why would you trade pieces when you're trying to attack? My rook was also doing nothing in my defense
moves.26. Rxe1 f6: At the start i thought it was a good move but then i saw the mistake he had made.
moves.27. Re8+: i go for the check. Should've went bd2-e3 but i think he would've noticed that.
moves.27... Ka7 28. Rh8: There we go. The Side affects of F6 are coming.
moves.28... Ra5: Perhaps Rh8 made him unaware and lowered his morale??????
moves.29. Bxa5: And here he Resigns knowing all he has left are pawns while i still have a few pieces left.
